verbs.description: if [ARG1: your bank account] [V: is] [ARG2: an llc account] can it be garnished a limited liability company is a legally separate entity created under state statutes therefore it is wholly distinct from its owners an llc shields its owners from personal liability related to the operations of the business if an llc fails to pay the irs or its creditors they may garnish its bank account if irs limited liability company
